Reviews.Title: Camera set
Reviews.Author: Daniel S
Reviews.Content: Great price, works very well. The 8 cameras around my house have not only helped keep an eye on my house but the entire area around it. I can see my cameras from my phone. if my alarm goes off I check the cameras to see who is there. You can't beat the price for what you get.

Reviews.Title: Best purchase ever made
Reviews.Author: jdtheentity
Reviews.Content: I am so glad I got this system. It is very inexpensive but not "cheap". This security system has all the features you could want in a home system. I recommend Kguard to everyone

Reviews.Title: Bad tech support
Reviews.Author: Ravin
Reviews.Content: Very bad tech support and they are not available all the time. Especially if you are buying a security system, and have problems in the week end or any other times, you should be able to get help. When I got them on the phone on a Monday, they acted like they don't give a damn. So, I do not recommend this at all. This company should either correct this issue, or quit and go out of doing business in America.
